item.title: Successful start-up hiring Software Engineers! (mountain view)
item.description:
Playdom is looking for bright, energetic entry-/intermediate-level Back-end Engineers to join our social gaming startup -- the company is a year old, profitable, well-funded, and already boasts the #1 app on MySpace as well as numerous other top titles. We're extremely picky: If you want to work with a crackerjack team and are interested in building the next great gaming company in a true startup environment (small team, proven success, huge upside), then send us your info.

We're not looking for a list of skills or set experience. We're looking for the sharpest entry/intermediate-level engineering talent and we're small and nimble enough to mold the position to you. Position will offer plenty of room for growth and advancement, hyper-competitive salary, full benefits and a solid equity package, and is full-time, on-site in downtown Mountain View (right off Castro Street).

If you're interested in developing (front-end/game design) the next wave of social networking applications in a true startup environment (small team, proven success, huge upside), then send us your info.  

WHAT WE'RE LOOKING FOR:
* BS in Computer Science (or equivalent) from top program and solid record of academic achievement 
* Solid experience with Java/MySQL
* Interest and proven skills handling extremely high-traffic, data intensive applications
* Comfort with runtime complexity, caching, and load balancing issues 
* Personality to handle responsibility, collaborate and excel in small team environment
* Nice but not necessary: experience developing social networking apps and a love of gaming

WHAT WE OFFER:
* Opportunity to build applications that will be used by millions
* Collaborative, supportive team environment
* Competitive pay, and a solid benefits package (including lunch/dinner)
* Ground-floor opportunity in a fast-growing company

TO APPLY:
Submit your information via our online form at http://www.playdom.com/contact.php and click on the EMPLOYMENT FORM.

There's no "black hole" here -- we review every resume by hand and get back to every person personally.

If you've already applied to Playdom, or have any questions, please email us at talent AT playdom dot com.
